meanings.definition: A game played on a miniature golf course.
meanings.sent1: Let's go play minigolfs this weekend with our friends.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the challenge of minigolfs on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: After a long week, relaxing with a game of minigolfs is the best.
meanings.sent4: The minigolfs course was a maze of fun and obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The colorful windmill in minigolfs made the course magical.

meanings.definition: To play a game of miniature golf.
meanings.sent1: She minigolfs every Saturday morning with her family.
meanings.sent2: We should minigolfs at the new course in town.
meanings.sent3: He minigolfs so well, he could teach a class on it.
meanings.sent4: The way she minigolfs shows her focus and skill.
meanings.sent5: Minigolfsing under the stars feels like a dream come true.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in a round of miniature golf.
meanings.sent1: His favorite part of the weekend is the minigolfs with his siblings.
meanings.sent2: We had a blast during the minigolfs at the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The minigolfs competition got intense, but in a fun way.
meanings.sent4: She always brings her lucky ball for minigolfs.
meanings.sent5: The laughter and joy during minigolfs are priceless.
